name: Bugpocalypse (larsdahl)
description:
You are Captain C. In a post apocalyptic future your farm is being overrun by nasty bugs.

GOAL ➞ Survive as many waves of bugs as you can

The bugs come in waves to feast on your beautiful crops, or feast on you! You have three kinds of plants to keep them at bay.

  • Food Plants to heal yourself
  • Seed Plants to get seeds to grow more plants
  • Turret Plants to shoot the bugs

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Numbers 1-6 to choose actions. Gun, Hoe, Water, Food, Seed, Turret

Tutorial

Credits

  • Art — Lucas Zoglio Mendez
  • Code — Simon Rosenthal, Valerii Morhun, Mohammad Ashour
  • Soun — Lars Dahl
